title: Bug 36684BIDI: LTRoriented MessageBox can't be created, if it's parent has RTL orientation.
OB: Bug 36684BIDI: LTRoriented MessageBox can't be created, if it's parent has RTL orientation. Currently MesageBox is always created with MBRTLREADING bit, if it's parenthas rtl orientation.
EB: It isn't correct, because it is supposed, that MessageBoxshould be created with orientation, which correspond to explicitly assignedorientation style. Only if orientation style isn't assigned, MessageBox shouldinherit orientation from it's parent.
